answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
A question similar to yours was actually asked in December. I have included the link to that below so you can view past responses.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/questions/question/20653
I did some additional research on your question and found a few ICMA resources which may be helpful. 
The first is a professional development online seminar called, “Asking Your Police and Fire Chief the Right Questions - To Get the Right Answers.”
http://learning.icma.org/store/seminar/seminar.php?seminar=6766 
ICMA also publishes a book called, “Selecting a Police Chief: A Handbook for Local Government.” 
http://bookstore.icma.org/Selecting_a_Police_Chief_A_Ha_P475C16.cfm 
I have also found links to more generic police interview questions. They might help guide the type of questions you would pose to a police chief.
http://www.interviewquestions.biz/police.htm
http://passthepolicetest.com/police-oral-board-interview/philadelphia-police-dept-oral-board-interview-questions
I hope these help!
Ali Iannolo
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org
